summary: A retired teacher and a soap star leave their routines and the men in their lives behind and embark on a weekend trip.
cast: Norma Aleandro|Natalia Oreiro|Leonardo Sbaraglia|Héctor Alterio|Alberto de Mendoza|Boy Olmi|Oscar Ferrigno Jr.|Eugenia Levin|Diego Rodríguez Ernesto|Pía Uribelarrea|Irene Goldszer|Luciana Dulitzky|Maite Zumelzú|Erasmo Olivera|Cristina Magariño|Roly Serrano|Martín Neglia|Beatriz Spelzini|Guillermo Carrasco|Víctor Hugo Coria|Emiliano Aguirre|Marcelo Meling|David Blanco|Agustina López|Mario Agustín Ruarte|Zoe Bertona|Cecilia Lee|Guillermo Buttini|Leticia Gonzalez|Roberto Vallejos|Jakie Pariseir|Luis Alcaíno|Patricia Calizaya|Cristina Bismach|Martín Aguilar|Gladys Ravalle|Jorge Fornes|Horacio Molina|Mario Paolucci
title: Cleopatra
